item.description:
Let's Enjoy the New Year with Some Vegetarian Chinese Food. This place was suggested by our Member Karen. Even if you are not a vegitarian (I'm not) I thought it would be fun to try this place.

All you need to bring is yourself and friends if you like and money for food.

Price Range is: $5-13 and it is categorized as cheap eats.

Hope to see you there!

This place is in Chinatown off the Orangeline T. Walk a short distance SE on Chinatown Sta - Walkway.
Turn right on Washington St.
Walk approx. 1 block S on Washington St.
Turn left on Beach St.
Walk a short distance E on Beach St.

Or go to www.Mapquest.com and find directions from your house, if driving.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Celebrate the New Year at Buddha's Delight Vegetarian Restaurant
